Article Title: India vs New Zealand ODI 2026 squad announcement - All you need to know
Article Text:
Virat Kohli and Rohit Sharma (AFP Photo)

India T20 World Cup squad: In search of ideal combination, Agarkar & Co. drop Shubman Gill

Ind vs NZ ODI 2026 squad announcement: All you need to know



New Zealand's ODI squad vs India

India vs New Zealand T20Is: Squads



India

New

Zealand

India vs New Zealand - Full ODI Schedule

Date Venue Time Sun, Jan 11, 2026 Vadodara, BCA Stadium, Kotambi 1:30 PM IST Wed, Jan 14, 2026 Rajkot, Niranjan Shah Stadium, Khandheri 1:30 PM IST Sun, Jan 18, 2026 Indore, Holkar Cricket Stadium 1:30 PM IST

India vs New Zealand - Full T20I Schedule

Date Venue Time Wed, Jan 21, 2026 Nagpur, Vidarbha Cricket Association Stadium 7:00 PM IST Fri, Jan 23, 2026 Raipur, Shaheed Veer Narayan Singh International Stadium 7:00 PM IST Sun, Jan 25, 2026 Guwahati, Barsapara Cricket Stadium 7:00 PM IST Wed, Jan 28, 2026 Visakhapatnam, ACA-VDCA Cricket Stadium 7:00 PM IST Sat, Jan 31, 2026 Thiruvananthapuram, Greenfield International Stadium 7:00 PM IST

NEW DELHI: India are set to host New Zealand for a high-profile eight-match limited-overs series beginning on January 11. The tour will feature three One-Day Internationals and five Twenty20 Internationals, with matches scheduled across multiple venues in the country through January 31.The series comes at a crucial juncture, with several senior players returning to the ODI format and the T20 side looking to fine-tune combinations ahead of the ICC T20 World Cup 2026, which gets underway on February 7 in India and Sri Lanka.The ODI leg of the series is expected to draw significant attention, particularly with stalwarts Virat Kohli and Rohit Sharma making their anticipated return to the 50-over format after the South Africa series.Meanwhile, the T20Is will act as a final testing phase for Suryakumar Yadav-led Indian side as they prepare for their T20 World Cup title defence.While the BCCI has already announced the T20I squad for the New Zealand series, the ODI squad is yet to be named.The BCCI selection committee is likely to hold an online meeting around January 3 or 4 to finalise the ODI squad for the home series against New Zealand.New Zealand have already announced their T20I and ODI squads for India series.Michael Bracewell (C), Adi Ashok, Kristian Clarke, Josh Clarkson, Devon Conway, Zak Foulkes, Mitch Hay, Kyle Jamieson, Nick Kelly, Jayden Lennox, Daryl Mitchell, Henry Nicholls, Glenn Phillips, Michael Rae, Will Young: Suryakumar Yadav (C), Abhishek Sharma, Sanju Samson, Tilak Varma, Hardik Pandya, Shivam Dube, Axar Patel, Rinku Singh, Jasprit Bumrah, Harshit Rana, Arshdeep Singh, Kuldeep Yadav, Varun Chakaravarthy, Washington Sundar, Ishan Kishan: Mitchell Santner (C), Michael Bracewell, Mark Chapman, Devon Conway, Jacob Duffy, Zak Foulkes, Matt Henry, Kyle Jamieson, Bevon Jacobs, Daryl Mitchell, James Neesham, Glenn Phillips, Rachin Ravindra, Tim Robinson, Ish Sodhi
Article Summary: India set to host new zealand for a high-profile limited-overs series beginning on january 11. The tour will feature three one-day internationals and five twenty20 internationals, with matches scheduled across multiple venues in the country through january 31.

Article Title: Seahawks star Cooper Kupp steps away from football, enjoys romantic date night with wife and "date mate for life" Anna Marie
Article Text:
Cooper Kupp and wife Anna Marie share heartfelt moment.Image via: Getty

Cooper Kupp and Anna Marie share a date night during Seahawks‚Äô strong season



Also read





Even during a busy NFL season, some moments take all the spotlight even though they aren't about football. This week, Cooper Kupp shared a small but meaningful glimpse into his personal life, showing fans a date night with his wife, Anna Marie Kupp.On Tuesday, Kupp posted a photo on Instagram from their outing. It was a simple selfie. Kupp was smiling, while Anna Marie looked at him with a soft expression. The post stood out because of how relaxed and genuine it felt, especially with the Seahawks in the middle of a strong season. Kupp added a flirty caption for his wife that read, "Date mate for life."Anna Marie later reshared the photo on her own Instagram story and added a message that quickly caught attention. ‚ÄúI love laughing through life with you, my king,‚Äù she wrote, adding a white heart emoji.Their date night came just one day after the Seattle Seahawks earned a Week 17 win over the Carolina Panthers. The win added to an impressive run for Seattle. With 13 wins so far, the Seahawks are leading the NFC West and heading into the final stretch with strong momentum.Seattle‚Äôs season has had ups and downs. The team opened the year with a loss to the San Francisco 49ers, then bounced back by winning three straight games.A loss in Week 5 to the Tampa Bay Buccaneers slowed things briefly, but the Seahawks responded with four wins in a row. After another setback in Week 11, they have now won six straight games and will face San Francisco again next.Anna Marie has also been sharing moments from their family life. Just last week, she posted photos from December 21, calling it the ‚Äúshortest day of the year.‚Äù Her caption reflected on gratitude and togetherness."December 21, 2025 Winter Solstice. The shortest day of the year well spent. We have walked through the darkness and now, as the sun makes its return, we pause and give thanks to a creator who intentionally gave us seasons to rest and grow," she wrote.The post included pictures of their children, family members, and a final video showing Anna Marie singing while Kupp played the guitar. The couple has been married since 2015 and shares three children together.
Article Summary: Cooper kupp and wife anna marie share heartfelt moment. The couple has been married since 2015 and shares three children together. Their date night came just one day after the seattle seahawks earned a week 17 win over the carolina panthers. With 13 wins so far, the seahawks are leading the nfc west.

Article Title: Watch: Jalen Hurts‚Äô standout season takes viral turn as Eagles QB meets fitness influencer and reality TV star Jacklyn Romano
Article Text:
Eagles star Jalen Hurts spotted with Jacklyn Romano.Image via: Getty

Jalen Hurts spotted with Jacklyn Romano during Eagles‚Äô title-winning season



Also read





Jalen Hurts has spent most of the season making headlines for what he does on the field. But as the Eagles quarterback wrapped up another successful year, a casual off-field moment briefly grabbed attention online and showed a different side of the Super Bowl MVP.On December 30, Hurts appeared in an Instagram video posted by fitness influencer and reality TV personality Jacklyn Romano. The short clip showed the two standing together in matching tennis-style outfits, relaxed and smiling. It was a simple moment, but it quickly caught the attention of Eagles fans during a season filled with wins and milestones.In the video, Hurts wore a sleeveless gray workout shirt, white shorts, white sneakers, and a black cap, with a towel over his shoulder. Romano was dressed in an all-white fitted athletic outfit, paired with white sneakers and sunglasses. The clip played to the song ‚ÄúUpside Down (Original CHIC Mix),‚Äù giving it a laid-back feel. Romano captioned the post with a clear nod to Hurts‚Äô team, writing, ‚ÄúGo birds, Philadelphia Eagles, ü§òüèªüèà. ‚ÄùThe timing of the post stood out, coming during one of the strongest stretches of Hurts‚Äô career. Hurts capped the year with a dominant performance on the biggest stage.He led Philadelphia to a 40-22 win over the Kansas City Chiefs in Super Bowl LIX on February 9 and was named Super Bowl MVP. Earlier in the season, Hurts shared a glimpse into his approach with a post on Instagram. He wrote ‚Äúmindset over everything‚Äù and added the hashtag ‚ÄúBREEDOF1‚Äù on September 6. That message became a stong theme for a year backed by focus and consistency.Romano has built her own profile outside of sports. She appeared on Peacock‚Äôs dating series Love Undercover and runs two businesses, Bikinis by Jacklyn and Jacklyn Fit Studio. Her social media presence centers on fitness, fashion, and lifestyle content.Hurts has also drawn attention for his fashion choices. Early in the 2025 season, he showed off the Air Jordan 11 ‚ÄúH-Town‚Äù at the opening of Jordan Brand‚Äôs first U.S. World of Flight store on October 10. The Houston-inspired sneaker was released on November 22 as part of the brand‚Äôs celebration of 30 years of the Air Jordan 11, first worn by Michael Jordan during the 1995 NBA playoffs.
Article Summary: Jalen hurts appeared in an instagram video posted by fitness influencer jacklyn romano. The short clip showed the two standing together in matching tennis-style outfits. The timing of the post stood out, coming during one of the strongest stretches of hurts‚Äô career.

Article Title: 5 richest NBA wives ranked: Ayesha Curry, Savannah James, and more
Article Text:
Ayesha Curry, Savannah James, and Gabrielle Union Wade. Image via: Getty Images

Savannah James - $100 million

Ayesha Curry - $50 million

Nina Westbrook - $50 million

Yvette Prieto - $50 million

Gabrielle Union Wade - $40 million





One might often think that the big league is all about the famous basketball players like LeBron James, Stephen Curry, and so on. However, the NBA has more to it as it is also surrounded by the wives of these very famous players, such as Ayesha Curry and Savannah James. All of them have excelled in something or the other in their lives, be it opening up charity foundations or being a successful entrepreneur.The NBA has ranked famous wives according to their net worth and total earnings. While Savannah James has recently spoken about how she has been building up her career from the very foundation, Ayesha Curry is a successful entrepreneur. And the one thing the NBA wives have in common is their shared telepathy of motherhood. The following are the top 5 richest NBA wives, ranked according to different criteria.The current Los Angeles Lakers‚Äô legend, LeBron James‚Äô wife, Savannah James, is a growing businesswoman, while having several throbbing ventures to her name. Currently, she possesses a whopping $100 million net worth. She currently owns a skincare brand known as ‚ÄúReframe Beauty‚Äù and has been significantly involved with the ‚ÄúLeBron James Family Foundation‚Äù. She also co-hosts a YouTube podcast, ‚ÄúEverybody‚Äôs Crazy‚Äù, with her daughter Zhuri James.The Golden State Warriors legend, Stephen Curry, is a star of the NBA. His wife, Ayesha Curry, boasts a net worth of $50 million, including her several ventures covering lifestyles, food, and media.Her most famous business involves a skincare brand, ‚ÄúSweet July Skin‚Äù, which is quite famous, all thanks to Ayesha Curry. Apart from this, her business expands to areas like wine brands and cafes, such as ‚ÄúDomaine Curry‚Äù, and ‚ÄúSweet July Cafe‚Äù.Russell Westbrook‚Äôs wife, Nina Westbrook, has a net worth that also stands at $50 million. From a star collegiate basketball player to a certified and known therapist, Nina Westbrook knows it all. Her company, ‚ÄúMinibrook‚Äù, is a children‚Äôs apparel brand, a clothing line that was launched in the year 2020, inspired by her three children. Not only that, Nina Westbrook donates a part of the profit to children‚Äôs welfare.The wife of the former Chicago Bulls‚Äô legend, Michael Jordan, Yvette Prieto, is a model, filmmaker, and entrepreneur and currently boasts a net worth of $50 million. Married to the basketball legend in 2013, her presence has boosted the combined net worth of Michael Jordan significantly.The wife of the NBA star, Dwyane Wade, Gabrielle Union Wade‚Äôs net worth stands at $40 million. Union Wade‚Äôs accomplishments involve those of her successful box office shows, such as ‚ÄúBad Boys II‚Äù and ‚ÄúBring it On‚Äù. Apart from these, she was also featured in the sitcom ‚ÄúF.R.I.E.N.D.S.‚ÄùAlso read: Top 5 NBA players who are Anime-heads
Article Summary: The nba has ranked famous wives according to their net worth and total earnings. Lebron james' wife, savannah james, has a whopping $100 million net worth. Russell westbrook‚Äôs wife, nina westbrook, boasts a net worth that also stands at $50 million. Gabrielle union wade is the wife of nba star, dwyane wade.

Article Title: Justin Thomas‚Äôs net worth 2025: The rise of an American professional who dominated the PGA Tour
Article Text:
Justin Thomas‚Äôs net worth 2025: The rise of an American professional who dominated the PGA Tour (Image Via Getty Images)

Justin Thomas' net worth, earnings, and endorsements



Early life and golf roots of Justin Thomas

Justin Thomas‚Äôs rise on the PGA Tour

Recent updates and personal life of Justin Thomas

Also Read:





Justin Thomas is one of the biggest stars in modern golf. The American professional golfer competes on the PGA Tour and has won major championships at the highest level of the sport. Known for his calm approach and powerful swing, Thomas has built success through hard work, consistency, and smart decisions both on and off the golf course.Justin Thomas‚Äôs net worth is estimated at $30- $45 million. He has earned around $75 million from official PGA Tour prize money alone. When bonuses and endorsements are added, his total career earnings are close to $100 million.He has endorsement deals with major brands like Titleist, FootJoy, Ralph Lauren, NetJets, and WHOOP. These partnerships play a big role in his income outside golf.Justin Thomas was born on April 29, 1993, in Louisville, Kentucky. Golf runs deep in his family. His father, Mike Thomas, is a golf professional and helped train him from a young age. Justin went to St. Xavier High School, where he quickly became one of the best junior golfers in the country.After high school, Justin attended the University of Alabama. There, he played college golf for the Crimson Tide.In 2012, he won the Haskins Award, given to the best college golfer in the United States. In 2013, he helped Alabama win the national championship. Soon after, he decided to turn professional.Justin Thomas turned professional in 2013 and earned his PGA Tour card in 2015. His first big win came at the CIMB Classic in 2015, which he defended the next year. His career truly took off in 2017. That year, he won five PGA Tour events, including the PGA Championship. He also won the FedEx Cup, making it the best season of his career.Thomas reached world number one in the Official World Golf Ranking in 2018 and again in 2020. He won his second PGA Championship in 2022.Thomas has stayed active on the PGA Tour in recent years and keeps competing in important tournaments. Key player for Team USA in the Ryder Cup and Presidents Cup as well. He has frankly discussed his 2019 skin cancer diagnosis off the course and currently advocates sun safety and routine medical checkups. A proven champion whose talent, discipline, and consistency continue to define modern professional golf.
Article Summary: Justin thomas was born on april 29, 1993, in louisville, kentucky. He turned professional in 2013 and earned his pga tour card in 2015. His first big win came at the cimb classic in 2015, which he defended the next year. His career truly took off in 2017, when he won five pga tour events.

Article Title: NBA legend Stephen Curry's firstborn son Canon Curry stuns everyone with impressive dribble skills as fans call him 'Simba'
Article Text:
Image via Getty

Fans react to Canon Curry ‚Äôs impressive dribble skills

Image via NBA/Instagram (screengrab)

How many children do Stephen Curry and Ayesha Curry have?

During a high-intensity game between the Golden State Warriors and the Brooklyn Nets, Stephen Curry‚Äôs eldest son decided to steal the limelight. The young kid pulled off some impressive dribbling skills, which stunned everyone. The clip went viral immediately and fan reactions started pouring in. Fans drew a reference to the famous movie The Lion King to describe the little kid. They called him Simba. Some of the fans have even stated that Canon is the only one who can break Stephen's records within the NBA This is a proud moment for the NBA legend. Stephen has had a great influence within the league. With his son showing off the skills at such a young age, fans have started expecting the young kid to be a potential ‚ÄúHall of Famer‚Äù if he ever decides to join the league. Recently, another clip had also gone viral where Stephen was spotted pulling off a secret handshake with his daughter Riley after a Warriors‚Äô win. Fans spotted Canon in that clip as well and some of them talked about the kind of attitude he was carrying in that video.The official page of NBA posted the clip of young Canon Curry dribbling the balls at the courtside. He was simultaneously dribbling two balls with both his hands.The visuals of this stunned everyone present in the stadium. NBA, while posting the clip, wrote, ‚ÄúSeems like @stephencurry30 has been teaching Canon well ü§Ø‚Äù The clip went viral in moments and generated significant reactions from the fans.ID@undefinedCaption not available.ID@undefinedCaption not available.ID@undefinedCaption not available.ID@undefinedCaption not available.One of the fans with the username ki.Thegroomer wrote, ‚ÄúAww, he‚Äôs so cute.. WE NEED A CENTER!‚Äù Another fan immediately believed that the young prodigy would one day be a Hall of Famer. Christownsend901 commented, ‚ÄúI‚Äôve seen enough. HOFer üî•üòÇ‚Äù A third fan with the username Kjfocus imagined the kind of records that would get broken if Canon too joins his father in the league. They added, ‚ÄúOh no, it can‚Äôt be two of em üòÇ the league will never get a break, get ready for 700 threes in a season ü§£‚ÄùAnother fan with the username dagr85poohdini wrote, ‚ÄúOnly person who can break Steph's records!!!‚Äù A fan even drew a reference from the famous Lion King movie while appreciating the skills of the little boy. Dee_onthegrind commented, ‚ÄúSimba, one day this all will be yours.‚Äù It was a reference to the famous Hollywood movies, The Lion King. The fan possibly referred to Stephen as Musfasa, the lead character of the movie and his son, Canon, as Simba, on which the storyline further continues.Stephen Curry and Ayesha Curry are the parents to four adorable kids. Canon Curry is just 7 years old as of 2025. He was born on July 2, 2025. He is the first son of the NBA legend Stephen Curry. Before him, Stephen and Ayesha Curry birthed two daughters, Riley Elizabeth and Ryan Carson. Riley and Ryan were born in 2012 and 2015, respectively. The couple‚Äôs youngest child was born in 2024.

Article Title: Max Scherzer and Erica May-Scherzer combined net worth in 2025: A closer look inside 'Mad Max' $180 million empire
Article Text:
Max Scherzer and Erica May-Scherzer (Image Source: Getty)

How Max Scherzer turned dominance into dollars

Erica May-Scherzer‚Äôs impact off the field





Max Martin Scherzer, the star baseball player, has made a career out of intensity, toughness, and an indomitable spirit to compete. The American professional Major League Baseball player is also known as ‚ÄòMad Max‚Äô, a pitcher who goes after hitters. That same determination is still noted in 2025, and this defines not only his presence on the pitch but also his financial position.As of 2025, Max Scherzer and his wife, Erica May-Scherzer, hold a combined net worth of approximately $180 million, making them one of the most financially secure couples in Major League Baseball.With an eight-time MLC All-Star title and three Cy Young Awards under his belt, Scherzer has consistently given elite performances into high value contracts. He started his career with the Arizona Diamondbacks and then topped it with the Detroit Tigers, Washington Nationals, and New York Mets.The right-handed free agent mindfully entered contracts that were more focused on longevity and control. High average annual salaries, player opt-outs, and deferred payments allowed Scherzer to protect his future earnings. In 2025, he still gets money as a result of the past transactions which makes him stronger in terms of income even in the off-season.Such impactful decisions soared his career earnings to the highest point in the history of MLB.Scherzer did not pursue the limelight beyond the baseball game. Rather, he collaborated with selective equipment and performance-oriented brands. These endorsements contribute to his wealth, but at the same time, they maintain his game-oriented image in the eyes of the public. He also invested carefully, instead of gambling on high-profile projects, Scherzer was interested in stability and long-term growth. Such a disciplined manner is a reflection of how he prepares for every start.Max‚Äôs wife, Erica May-Scherzer, is a former softball player who has experience at the collegiate administrative level, giving her an understanding of professional sports. Owing to her professional player background, Erica has been a great contributor to the success of Scherzer in his career and has helped the couple on and off the field. Although public sources do not track her personal holdings, she is the core of the family philanthropy activities. Together, the Scherzers actively promote causes related to education, health, and social justice.The combined success of Max and Erica May-Scherzer is a result of consistency, crucial planning, and focused sustainability. Moreover, the couple is known to not engage in excessive endorsement but is rather mindful of them. This strategy has made their long career in baseball a permanent financial standard as well. Having a net worth of approximately $180 million, Scherzers can be viewed as a successful case study of how financial discipline, elite performance, and long-term thinking can build an empire that will endure long after the final pitch.Also Read: Austin Riley and Anna Morgan‚Äôs combined net worth in 2025: Career earnings, salary, family life and more
Article Summary: As of 2025, max scherzer and his wife, erica may-scherzer, hold a combined net worth of approximately $180 million. The couple is known to not engage in excessive endorsement but is rather mindful of them. Together, the scherzers actively promote causes related to education, health, and social justice.

Article Title: Bruno Fernandes vs Martin √òdegaard: 2025-26 Premier League salary comparison, contract details, net worth, and more
Article Text:
Premier League captains Bruno Fernandes and Martin √òdegaard are top midfielders, commanding significant salaries and fan bases. Fernandes, older and with a longer global profile, boasts a higher net worth and lucrative endorsements. √òdegaard, though earning less, has performance-based incentives in his deal. Both are among England's highest-paid midfielders.

Bruno Fernandes vs. Martin √òdegaard: Financial differences

Earnings hierarchy

Casemiro (Manchester United): ¬£350,000/week (~$470,000 Bruno Fernandes (Manchester United): ¬£300,000/week (~$400,000) Bernardo Silva (Manchester City): ¬£300,000/week (~$400,000) Kai Havertz (Arsenal): ¬£280,000/week (~$370,000) Martin √òdegaard / Declan Rice (Arsenal): ¬£240,000/week (~$320,000)





Bruno Fernandes and Martin √òdegaard are two names that are ruling the Premier League midfield. They both serve as captains for their teams - Manchester United for Fernandes and Arsenal for √òdegaard. And both have a strong fanbase when it comes to their talent and charisma both on and off the field. To understand where these two sit in the hierarchy of Premier League superstars, let's compare these two defining creative forces of this era.At 31, Bruno Fernandes is in the "prime veteran" stage of his career, allowing him to negotiate a higher base salary during his 2024 renewal. Martin √òdegaard, being 27, is on a high-value long-term deal signed in late 2023. While √òdegaard‚Äôs earning is lower, his contract has multiple add-ons with heavier incentives related to Arsenal‚Äôs recent title charges and Champions League qualification.Bruno Fernandes holds a slight edge in net worth due to his longer career span at the top of the global game and his status as a national icon for Portugal, alongside Cristiano Ronaldo. This has granted him access to lucrative global endorsements, like Nike and Gillette, that Martin √òdegaard is only now beginning to match. With his international profile with the Norway national team growing, the latter is making up for the late entry to the game.Bruno Fernandes is known for a conservative but high-value property portfolio in Lisbon, Manchester, and the Algarve. His investments are geared toward post-career stability in mind. √òdegaard, on the other hand, has focused heavily on tech investments and sports startups in Scandinavia, reflecting a younger generation‚Äôs approach to wealth management.In the current 2025/26 landscape, Bruno Fernandes and Martin √òdegaard remain two of the highest-paid midfielders in England. Here is how the top bracket looks:Both midfielders try to bring their best game in every match, and are two of the biggest names in the current English Premier League. Fernandes's net worth at current is around ¬£50 million (~$63.5 million), while √òdegaard has accumulated a fortune worth of ¬£20-25 million (~$25 - $35 million).Also Read: Bruno Fernandes and Ana Pinho Combined Net Worth in 2025: Manchester United career, salary, investments and more

Fernandes, older and with a longer global profile, boasts a higher net worth and lucrative endorsements. √ò degaard, though earning less, has performance-based incentives in his deal.

Article Title: Joseph Parker and Andy Lee combined net worth in 2025: Boxing earnings, investments, career success, lifestyle, and more
Article Text:
Joseph Parker and Andy Lee (Image Source: Getty)

Joseph Parker's boxing career, salary, and investments

Andy Lee‚Äôs investments, career, and net worth of the boxer-coach duo





Joseph Parker and Andy Lee represent a boxing victory that still attracts fans. Wise investments and brand deals are also factors of their financial trajectory apart from boxing careers. The former WBO heavyweight champion, Parker, still brings in millions from fights and endorsements while the retired WBO middleweight champion, Lee, maintains his fortune through coaching, commentary, and making good financial choices.Joseph Parker has made a property investment and lives a nice lifestyle in New Zealand, where he manages family life and boxing training at the same time. Lee‚Äôs living comparatively and modestly is still an ongoing process that comes from Parker‚Äôs competition with him, and that is the reason he can still mentor others.Parker‚Äôs comeback victories over Deontay Wilder and Zhilei Zhang have also increased his fight purses. The reports say that he gets $1.5 million for each fight. Parker's financial status is probably to be significantly enhanced, though, as Wardley and Dubois are going to create difficult fights, earning him more money apart from his fight purses.Apart from this, he gets a cut from the pay-per-view revenues besides his fight purses and has endorsement contracts that steadily reinforce his position as one of the richest heavyweight boxers in this era.His sponsorships and public appearances are also contributing to his financial security. It is very easy to approach him, and he also keeps it simple. Parker is sometimes overtly issues his Samoan background and connections to the community.Lee‚Äôs career highlights are winning the WBO title in 2014 against Matt Korobov plus a record of 35 wins, 24 by knockout. After retiring, he began to coach and do television commentary, training boxers like Tyson Fury and participating in the boxing world, which still earns him money. Lee focuses on the coaching and commentary side of the sport, thus making sure that the income after retirement is not so unstable.Parker and Lee together will have a combined net worth of $25-$37 million in 2025, which proves that their relevance in the boxing world as well as in other fields has been continuous and strong.Also Read: Joseph parker net worth in 2025: Boxing career, earnings, endorsements, lifestyle and more
Article Summary: Former wbo heavyweight champion, parker, still brings in millions from fights and endorsements. The retired wbo middleweight champion, lee, maintains his fortune through coaching, commentary, and making good financial choices. Lee's living comparatively and modestly is still an ongoing process that comes from parker‚Äôs competition with him.

Article Title: NBA‚Äôs biggest injuries in 2025: Tyrese Haliburton, Nikola Jokic, and more
Article Text:
Tyrese Haliburton #0 of the Indiana Pacers sustains an injury during the first quarter against the Oklahoma City Thunder in Game Seven of the 2025 NBA Finals at Paycom Center on June 22, 2025 in Oklahoma City, Oklahoma.(Photo by Justin Ford/Getty Images)

1. Tyrese Haliburton face Achilles heartbreak



2. Nikola Jokic‚Äôs knee hypertension

3. Ja Morant‚Äôs constant ankle trouble



4. 4. Kyrie Irving goes ‚ÄúOut‚Äù



5. Fred VanVleet injury troubles







With the NBA‚Äôs expansion, every game demands more from players on the hardwood. From fancier dunks to ‚Äúswish‚Äù threes, the league‚Äôs requirement from its stars is at an all-time high. The sport of basketball is one of the world‚Äôs fastest in the world, and along with its breakneck speed, it is physically taxing on the players. The constant matches with no time to rest and reenergize have increased the risks of injuries.With 2025 ending, a lot of injuries were reported that reshaped the championship landscape in the NBA.From heartbreaking Achilles tears in the Finals to the ongoing maintenance of the league's most dominant big men, health has become the ultimate X-factor for the 2025-26 season.After leading the Indiana Pacers to a historic Game 7 in the NBA Finals, Tyrese Haliburton suffered a torn Achilles tendon in the summer of 2025 that has sidelined him for this entire season. With their star player injured, the Indiana Pacers were forced into a development and survival mode, leaning heavily on Bennedict Mathurin while their title window stays frustratingly closed for a year.Nuggets announced on 30th December 2025, that the MVP contender is out for at least four weeks after suffering a left knee hyperextension in a matchup against Miami.For the Denver Nuggets, Jokiƒá isn't just a player, he is their core system, and his absence puts immense pressure on Jamal Murray and Aaron Gordon on the offensive side. With the Western Conference filled with heavyweights, this 4-week stretch turns the tables for the worse.The dunking star suffered an ankle sprain back in October and then another ankle sprain in December. These repetitive injuries could potentially become a stumbling block for the Grizzlies during the playoffs. Memphis remains a contender only when Morant is on the floor, and this constant uncertainty gives a shaky foundation for their championship dream.The Dallas Mavericks have spent most of 2025 trying to fill in the gap left by their superstar point guard, Kyrie Irving, who sustained a torn left ACL in early March against the Kings. Irving‚Äôs injury abruptly ended his 2024-25 campaign and forced the Mavericks into a difficult spot. Despite the arrival of Anthony Davis and the rookie sensation Cooper Flagg, the team has struggled in clutch situations without Irving‚Äôs elite shot-making.With Kevin Durant's addition to the team, Rockets are currently Houston to a top-four standing. But without their key two-way player, Fred VanVleet, who suffered an ACL injury in September, the Rockets are missing their vital component. VanVleet‚Äôs influence on the team‚Äôs culture is commendable, and his loss was a significant hit to the team. The 2019 NBA champion‚Äôs absence forces young stars like Amen Thompson into high-pressure roles.Also read: Is Nikola Jokic‚Äôs NBA MVP bid slipping away as knee injury lingers for Denver Nuggets star?
Article Summary: With 2025 ending, a lot of injuries were reported that reshaped the championship landscape in the nba. Tyrese haliburton suffered a torn achilles tendon in the summer of 2025 that has sidelined him for this entire season. Dallas mavericks have spent most of 2025 trying to fill in the gap left by their superstar point guard, kyrie irving, who sustained a torn left acl.

Article Title: Five documentaries you should watch if you love NBA
Article Text:
Allen Iverson (Photo by: Doug Pensinger/Getty Images)

1. Hoop Dreams



2. The Last Dance



3. The Redeem Team



4. Winning Time: Reggie Miller vs. The New York Knicks



5. Allen Iv3rson







There is something incredibly about documentaries as they brilliantly capture the raw emotions and do justice to the intensity behind them. Basketball as a sport is just not about rings and championships, it is about every single drop of sweat that made a player‚Äôs dream of becoming a champion real. Documentaries will not give the audience a polished version rather, they will show all: tears, mental breakdowns, locker room drama, and the unbreakable mentality.These five documentaries remind everyone what it took to sit in the ultimate champion seat and what made one a fan of this very sport.Release Date: October 14, 1994 | Director: Steve JamesWidely considered the greatest sports documentary ever made, Hoop Dreams follows two Chicago teenagers, William Gates and Arthur Agee, for five years as they chase the elusive dream of the NBA. It‚Äôs not just about basketball, it‚Äôs a moving look at race, class, and the weight of expectation.Release Date: April 19, 2020 | Studio: ESPN / NetflixThis ten-part miniseries is the definitive account of Michael Jordan‚Äôs final championship season with the 1997-98 Chicago Bulls. With never-before-seen footage, it offers a revealing, sometimes uncomfortable look at Jordan‚Äôs legendary competitiveness and the internal politics of a dynasty.Release Date: October 7, 2022 | Studio: NetflixThis documentary is about the 2008 USA men‚Äôs Olympic basketball team, who, after a humiliating loss in 2004, were in search of reclaiming their gold medal. This film is a cultural reset as it shows the ‚Äúwin at any cost‚Äù mentality. The 2008 team was led by Kobe Bryant, LeBron James, and Dwyane Wade, who, through their discipline and teamwork, restored America‚Äôs pride on the global stage.Release Date: March 14, 2010 | Director: Dan KloresFew things are more entertaining than a great rivalry. This documentary captures the mid-'90s feud between the Indiana Pacers and the Knicks, highlighting Reggie Miller‚Äôs role as the ultimate "villain" in Madison Square Garden.Release Date: October 23, 2025 | Studio: Prime VideoAllen Iverson‚Äôs impact in NBA is non-negotiable. He not only redefined his playing position but also took the tunnel fashion to the next level. Produced by Stephen Curry and Shaq, Allen Iv3rson is a three-part docuseries exploring the life is AI or The Answer, a nickname that he famously got for being the solution to the 76ers' struggles. This film also focuses on Iverson‚Äôs original style, which was born out of mixing hip-hop and streetball, and how he revolutionized the basketball culture.Also read: Five Basketball movies you shouldn‚Äôt miss
Article Summary: Hoop dreams follows two chicago teenagers, william gates and arthur agee, for five years as they chase the elusive dream of the nba. Winning time: reggie miller vs. the new york knicks highlights the mid-'90s feud between the indiana pacers and the knicks.

Article Title: Is Victor Wembanyama playing tonight vs the New York Knicks? Latest update on the San Antonio Spurs star's injury report (December 31, 2025)
Article Text:
Victor Wembanyama is playing with limited minutes (Image via NBA)

Victor Wembanyama

will play for

San Antonio Spurs

Victor Wembanyama's injury report vs the New York Knicks (December 31, 2025)

San Antonio Spurs Injury Situation vs New York Knicks (December 31, 2025)

NBA Cup Final Rematch Adds Context

Why Victor Wembanyama‚Äôs Availability Matters for the San Antonio Spurs (December 31, 2025)





on Tuesday night. He is not listed on the injury report for the Spurs‚Äô December 31 game against the New York Knicks, confirming his availability for the New Year‚Äôs Eve matchup.The timing matters. This game is a rematch of the NBA Cup Final, and San Antonio enters it dealing with injuries elsewhere on the roster. With key teammates sidelined or uncertain, Wembanyama‚Äôs presence carries added importance for a Spurs team trying to finish the year on a strong note.Victor Wembanyama comes into the game healthy after playing heavy minutes in a recent loss to Cleveland. In that outing, he scored 26 points, grabbed 14 rebounds, and added three assists. There were no issues afterward, and the Spurs cleared him without restriction.Through the season, Wembanyama is averaging 24.0 points, 11.7 rebounds, and 3.0 blocks per game. His production places him among the league‚Äôs top performers, often mentioned in the same conversations as Nikola Jokiƒá. Against New York, much of the focus will be on his work on the glass, where he has consistently cleared double-digit rebounds.San Antonio will be short-handed. Devin Vassell remains out with a right adductor strain and is not expected to return until early January.His absence removes a reliable scorer and perimeter defender from the lineup.Stephon Castle is listed as questionable due to a left thumb sprain. The former Rookie of the Year has played a key role this season, and his status will likely be decided closer to tip-off. Aside from those two, no other major Spurs players are dealing with confirmed injuries.Tuesday‚Äôs game revisits the NBA Cup Final, a result the Spurs have not moved past. Wembanyama has already said the team ‚Äúowes‚Äù the Knicks one after that loss, making this matchup more than just another regular-season game.From a basketball standpoint, analysts expect San Antonio to lean heavily on Wembanyama at both ends. His size and reach present problems for New York, while the Knicks will look for contributions from role players such as Miles McBride to counter his impact.When Wembanyama is on the floor, defenses adjust. He draws attention in the paint, creates space for teammates, and protects the rim. In the earlier meeting with New York, he delivered several momentum-shifting plays, including a powerful finish inside.Also read: Is Josh Hart playing tonight vs the San Antonio Spurs? Latest update on the New York Knicks star's injury report (December 31, 2025) With Vassell out and Castle uncertain, the Spurs will once again ask Wembanyama to carry the load. His recent form supports that approach. Over his last two games, he has totaled 58 points and 21 rebounds. Against the New York Knicks, San Antonio‚Äôs chances begin and end with him.
Article Summary: Victor wembanyama is not listed on the san antonio spurs' injury report. He is expected to play against the new york knicks on new year's eve. The game is a rematch of the nba cup final, which san antonio lost. Devin vassell remains out with a right adductor strain.

Article Title: What does Jarred Kelenic‚Äôs minor league deal with the Chicago White Sox mean for his MLB future?
Article Text:
What does Jarred Kelenic‚Äôs minor league deal with the Chicago White Sox mean for his MLB future? (Image Via Getty)

Jarred Kelenic joins Chicago White Sox on minor league deal





Jarred Kelenic is getting another chance to stay in Major League Baseball. On Monday, in early 2026, the 26-year-old outfielder signed a minor league contract with the Chicago White Sox, according to ESPN. The deal includes an invitation to major league spring training in Arizona. For Jarred Kelenic, this move is about one thing, finding a way back to regular MLB playing time.Once seen as a future star, Jarred Kelenic has spent the last few seasons fighting inconsistency. The White Sox offer him a new place, a new staff, and a clear chance to compete. With Chicago still reshaping its roster, this signing gives both sides something to gain.Jarred Kelenic was drafted sixth overall in the 2018 MLB Draft by the New York Mets. At that time, he was one of the most talked-about young players in baseball.By December 2018, the Mets traded him to the Seattle Mariners in a major deal that brought Robinson Can√≥ and Edwin D√≠az to New York.Jarred Kelenic made his MLB debut in May 2021 with Seattle, playing as a left-handed hitting outfielder known for speed and defense.However, his bat never stayed hot for long. Across five MLB seasons, he posted a .211 batting average, with a high strikeout rate of over 30 percent, according to MLB.com data.His best stretch came in 2023, when he hit .253 with 11 home runs and 49 RBIs in 105 games for Seattle.That season took a sharp turn in July 2023, when he broke his left foot after kicking a water cooler in frustration.Speaking to reporters in Seattle after the injury, Jarred Kelenic said, ‚ÄúI let emotions get the best of me. I take full responsibility. It can‚Äôt happen.‚ÄùSeattle traded Jarred Kelenic to the Atlanta Braves before the 2024 season. He became Atlanta‚Äôs everyday center fielder and hit a career-high 15 home runs, but strikeouts remained an issue.In 2025, his season unraveled fast. He hit .167 in 24 games and was publicly criticized by Ronald Acu√±a Jr. for lack of hustle during a game in Atlanta.Now in Chicago, Jarred Kelenic joins a White Sox team that has stayed active this offseason. The club recently added Anthony Kay and Japanese slugger Munetaka Murakami.With the White Sox reportedly listening to trade offers for Luis Robert Jr., there may be a path for outfield playing time if Jarred Kelenic performs well in spring training.For now, this deal is small on paper. But for Jarred Kelenic, it is a critical step to keep his MLB career alive.Also Read: MLB Trade Rumors: Detroit Tigers Eye Alex Bregman Cautiously As Pittsburgh Pirates Predict Strong Push For Kazuma Okamoto
Article Summary: Jarred kelenic signed a minor league contract with the chicago white sox on monday. The deal includes an invitation to major league spring training in arizona. Kelenic was drafted sixth overall in the 2018 mlb draft by the new york mets. Across five mlb seasons, he posted a.211 batting average.

Article Title: Why is Jayson Tatum is out for the Boston Celtics? NBA star receives concerning right Achilles tendon rupture update after the 2025 playoffs
Article Text:
Boston Celtics forward Jayson Tatum (Image via AP Photo/Charles Krupa)

Jayson Tatum is out for the Boston Celtics

How Jayson Tatum's Injury Happened

How Long Will Jaysin Tatum Take to Recover From His Injury?

Jayson Tatum (Image via Getty)

Boston‚Äôs Long-Term View With Tatum

How the Boston Celtics Have Adjusted





as he recovers from a right Achilles tendon rupture suffered during the 2025 playoffs. As December 2025 ends, the team has not set a return date. Boston is focused on getting him fully healthy rather than pushing for an early comeback.The Celtics have stayed consistent in their approach. Even with the team holding its ground in the standings, Tatum continues to be listed as out on injury reports. Clearance will only come once the medical staff is fully satisfied with his recovery.Tatum tore his Achilles in Game 4 of the Eastern Conference Semifinals against the New York Knicks last spring. The injury ended his postseason immediately and changed the direction of the series. Boston went on to lose in six games, closing the season earlier than expected.He underwent surgery on May 13, 2025. For players at his level, Achilles recovery usually takes nine to twelve months, which made it clear early on that his return would likely come deep into the 2025-26 season, if at all.Jayson Tatum‚Äôs rehab has moved forward without setbacks. He returned to on-court workouts by late September and was dunking again by October.By December, people around the team said he wants to play this season and has been fully committed to the process.That progress has not changed Boston‚Äôs stance. The Celtics reportedly sought opinions from multiple doctors and have continued to rule him out for games, including late-December matchups. The message has been steady: no shortcuts.Head coach Joe Mazzulla and team president Brad Stevens have both stressed patience. With Boston Celtics posting a strong record without Tatum, there is no urgency to take risks. Some around the league expect a possible late-season return if conditions are right, while others believe he may sit out the entire year.Tatum has echoed that thinking, saying he feels no pressure to rush and wants to return only when he is fully ready.Jaylen Brown has taken on a larger scoring role and led the offense with consistency. Derrick White and the rest of the rotation have filled gaps on both ends, keeping Boston near the top of the Eastern Conference.The team has stayed competitive without its star. When Tatum does return, the Celtics expect to add him to a group that has already learned how to win without him.
Article Summary: Jayson tatum tore his achilles in game 4 of the eastern conference semifinals against the new york knicks last spring. The injury ended his postseason immediately and changed the direction of the series. Boston is focused on getting him fully healthy rather than pushing for an early comeback.

Article Title: NHL Injury update: Auston Matthews out for Toronto Maple Leafs with lower-body issues
Article Text:
Toronto Maple Leafs center Auston Matthews is named the first star of the game after the NHL regular season game between the Chicago Blackhawks and the Toronto Maple Leafs (Credit: Getty Images)

What is going on with Auston Matthews?

Auston Matthews' injury update for Maple Leafs' next games







Toronto Maple Leafs captain Auston Matthews is hospitalized and deemed day-to-day due to a lower-body injury that he got in the overtime defeat against the Detroit Red Wings on Sunday. Matthews, who blocked a shot in the second period, spent only a minute off the ice before coming back to complete the game. Nevertheless, there was an effort, and the team confirmed that he will not be playing on Tuesday in the home game against the New Jersey Devils.The Maple Leafs have already suffered a trail of injuries. Defenseman Chris Tanev is still out with a lower-body problem, and it is his second absence of the season of at least 23 games since he was out with an upper-body injury previously. Centre Dakota Joshua is also out as he undergoes treatment for a kidney trauma against the Red Wings.Toronto had Matt Benning and Jacob Quillan from the Toronto Marlies of the AHL to fill the gaps in the lineup. Quillan has been among the best performers of the Marlies this season, as he has been the leading scorer of the team, besides demonstrating consistent defensive performance. Benning is a veteran who has played in more than 460 NHL games and will be a good depth player on the blue line.This season, Matthews, 27, has been credited with 15 goals and 12 assists in 33 games, and is second in the Maple Leafs in goals and faceoff wins and fourth in points with 27. His absence is a big blow to the Toronto team, who are still in last position in the Atlantic Division but only four points behind a playoff position as they face off a difficult run of games.Also Read: Net worth of Auston Matthews in 2025: Details on Vegas Golden Knights captain's earnings, salary, and contracts
Article Summary: Toronto maple leafs captain auston matthews is hospitalized and deemed day-to-day due to a lower-body injury that he got in the overtime defeat against the detroit red wings on sunday. Matthews, who blocked a shot in the second period, spent only a minute off the ice before coming back to complete the game.

Article Title: NHL injury update: Leafs‚Äô Chris Tanev sidelined with lower-body concerns ahead of next game
Article Text:
Chris Tanev of the Toronto Maple Leafs looks to play the puck against the Pittsburgh Penguins (Credit: Getty Images)

Chris Tanev out for Toronto Maple Leafs' next game and what it means for the team







The hopes of the Toronto Maple Leafs to have a healthy roster have been struck again. Another setback to Toronto will be the absence of defenceman Chris Tanev in the next game because of a lower-body injury, which will further hurt their quest to rise up the Atlantic Division ladder. Tanev is one of the most important shutdown defenders. Hence, his absence is especially frightening since he had missed an earlier 23 games of the current season due to an upper-body problem.Tanev is infectious on the ice, as the teammates and even the analysts of the team refer to his presence on the ice due to his leadership, positioning, and dependability during critical situations.Chris Tanev, the central shutdown defenceman of the Toronto Maple Leafs, is injured with a lower-body injury and is a game-time decision, which leaves a major defensive void. Auston Matthews, the team captain, is also a game-time decision, having suffered a lower-body injury in the overtime defeat to the Detroit Red Wings on Sunday. William Nylander is still on a day-to-day, and is unlikely to play a second consecutive game, which makes it even tougher on Toronto.The Maple Leafs recalled young centre Jacob Quillan in order to fill the gaps in the team, who is from the Toronto Marlies. He has been a promising prospect in the AHL this season, scoring 23 points in 26 games.The estimated team of Toronto will consist of both more experienced and younger players, where Tanev will most likely be missed on defence. The team has the New Jersey Devils as the next match in the NHL, and the team is expected to play well in order to defeat the existing wound problems.Also Read: Net worth of Auston Matthews in 2025: Details on Vegas Golden Knights captain's earnings, salary, and contracts
Article Summary: Chris tanev, the central shutdown defenceman of the toronto maple leafs, is injured with a lower-body injury. Auston matthews, the team captain, is also a game-time decision. William nylander is still on a day-to-day, and is unlikely to play a second consecutive game, which makes it even tougher on toronto.

Article Title: Patrick Mahomes breaks silence after Tyreek Hill suffers horrific injury
Article Text:
Image via Getty

A friendship that goes beyond the game of football

Rumors of a Tyreek Hill trade



Also Read:





After his close friend and former teammate Tyreek Hill was hurt badly, Kansas City Chiefs quarterback Patrick Mahomes spoke out. This shocking event sent shockwaves through the NFL on Monday night.During their Week 17 game against the New York Jets, Hill, who now plays for the Miami Dolphins, was taken off the field on a cart after what seemed like a serious injury to his lower leg. In the third quarter, Hill caught a ball and then put his foot down in a weird fashion. Replays indicated that his leg was bending in a weird way, which made teammates, fans, and doctors all worry straight away.Mahomes quickly turned to social media to show his support. "Prayers up man üôèüôè," the Chiefs quarterback posted on X. It was a short but heartfelt statement that instantly went viral.During their tenure with the Kansas City Chiefs, Mahomes and Hill had some of the best seasons of their careers together. They were one of the league's most explosive quarterback-receiver pairs. The two were key players in Kansas City's Super Bowl-winning season in 2019. Hill's quickness and Mahomes' arm changed the way modern NFL offenses work.In 2022, Hill left Kansas City in a big deal, but the two stars have stayed close. Hill has called Mahomes a "brother" many times, saying that he pushes his teammates and sets high standards in the locker room.That history made Mahomes' reaction even more important as Hill lay hurt on the field.It hasn't been officially confirmed how bad Hill's injury is, but early signs point to it being a serious setback that could finish his season. There had already been rumors about Hill's future in Miami, with reports saying he was frustrated with the Dolphins' problems and there were worries about the direction of the roster.It looks like any notion of a reunion with Kansas City is on wait for now. Hill, who will be 31 next year, has a big cap cost for the 2026 season, and a long rehab process might make things much harder for Miami's front management to decide what to do.Before leaving the game, Hill caught six passes for 67 yards, which was one of his better games in a season that has been tough for the Dolphins.It's still not known when Mahomes will be back, but his message to Hill showed how deeply personal events can break through professional rivalries and club loyalties.
Article Summary: Kansas city chiefs quarterback patrick mahomes posted a heartfelt message to former teammate tyreek hill. Hill, who now plays for the miami dolphins, was taken off the field on a cart after what seemed like a serious injury to his lower leg. The two were key players in kansas city's super bowl-winning season in 2019.

Article Title: Lamar Jackson injury update: Will Ravens QB play Week 18 vs. Steelers?
Article Text:
Image via IMAGN

Lamar Jackson‚Äôs injury status ahead of Week 18

How Lamar Jackson's return affects the Ravens vs. Steelers game

Also Read:





The Baltimore Ravens‚Äô heading into Week 18 a major question arises: will Lamar Jackson be available for the final clash against the Pittsburgh Steelers? With the AFC North title on the line, Jackson‚Äôs status has become the defining storyline of the final week of the regular season.Jackson missed Baltimore‚Äôs Week 17 game against the Green Bay Packers after suffering a painful back injury in Week 16. While the Ravens managed to win without him, the absence of their franchise quarterback raised immediate concerns about his availability for the most important game of the season.According to Ian Rapoport of NFL Network, there is renewed optimism. Rapoport reported that Jackson is expected to practice midweek, a significant step forward after he was unable to participate at all last week. If confirmed, it would mark Jackson‚Äôs first on-field work since the injury occurred.Jackson's involvement in practice doesn't mean he'll be available, but it does strongly suggest that he's going in the right direction.John Harbaugh, the head coach of the Ravens, has said that the team will not rush Jackson back until he is completely ready. Internally, the injury has been called "painful," and Baltimore is putting long-term health ahead of short-term goals.If Jackson is cleared, it would make things a lot easier for Baltimore. The two-time MVP has a level of explosiveness and playmaking that no backup can match, especially when playing against a division foe on the road.The Ravens have played it safe on offense since Jackson left. That method works well sometimes, but it might not be enough against a Steelers defense that does well when there is pressure and turnovers. In a close, low-scoring game, Jackson's ability to move around and make plays could be the difference.Jackson's possible comeback makes things harder for the Steelers. Not only would defensive game plans have to change because of his arm, but also because of his legs. This would force Pittsburgh to cover the whole width of the field.At this point, Jackson is officially day-to-day, and we should know more about his Week 18 status before the end of the week. Before coming to any conclusions, Ravens supporters should keep a close eye on injury reports and who is practicing.
Article Summary: Lamar jackson is expected to practice for the first time since suffering a back injury in week 16. If confirmed, it would mark jackson‚Äôs first on-field work since the injury occurred. The two-time mvp has a level of explosiveness and playmaking no backup can match.

Article Title: LeBron James‚Äô 41st birthday ends in another rough night for the Los Angeles Lakers, fans express disappointment
Article Text:
LeBron James (Image via Getty)

How the Detroit Pistons Controlled the Game Early

Mixed Nights for the Stars

Detroit Pistons guard Cade Cunningham (2) looks to pass the ball while being guarded by Los Angeles Lakers guard Luka Doncic (77) during the first half of an NBA basketball game Tuesday, Dec. 30, 2025, in Los Angeles. (AP Photo/Caroline Brehman)

Fans Point to Familiar Problems

Where the Los Angeles Lakers Stand Now





The night was supposed to mark another milestone for LeBron James. Instead, it ended with a flat loss that left the building quiet. On December 30, 2025, the Los Angeles Lakers were beaten 128‚Äì106 by the Detroit Pistons at Crypto.com Arena, spoiling James‚Äô 41st birthday.The result dropped the Lakers to 20-11 and extended a rough stretch in which they have lost four of their last five games. The concern wasn‚Äôt just the loss, but how it happened. The same issues showed up again: poor defense, careless turnovers, and little help beyond the top players.Detroit Pistons took charge from the opening quarter and never let the Los Angeles Lakers settle. The Pistons shot 63 percent from the field and 46 percent from three. They scored 74 points in the paint and added 31 on fast breaks, repeatedly beating Los Angeles down the floor.Turnovers made things worse. The Lakers gave the ball away 20 times, and Detroit turned those mistakes into 30 points. After Los Angeles briefly tied the game at 79-79 late in the third quarter, the Pistons answered with a 16-6 run to start the fourth and pulled away for good. Even after Tobias Harris left early with a hip sprain, Detroit‚Äôs bench stayed productive and steady.James struggled to find rhythm. He finished with 17 points on 6-of-17 shooting, along with four rebounds, four assists, five turnovers, and a minus-16 plus-minus in his 1,577th regular-season game.Luka Donƒçiƒá led the Lakers with 30 points, 11 assists, and five rebounds, but he also committed eight turnovers, which added to the team‚Äôs problems.Detroit‚Äôs guards set the tone. Cade Cunningham scored 27 points and handed out 11 assists, consistently breaking down the defense. Marcus Sasser added 19 points off the bench. The Pistons improved to 25-8 and continued to look like one of the league‚Äôs most reliable teams.Reaction online focused on the same themes seen in recent losses. Fans questioned the Lakers‚Äô defense, the lack of bench production, and the pattern of close wins followed by heavy defeats. Some criticism was aimed at Donƒçiƒá‚Äôs defense, while others focused on the roster as a whole.Head coach JJ Redick also drew attention, with fans asking for clearer direction as injuries to Austin Reaves and Gabe Vincent continue to affect rotations.Redick said turnovers changed the game and pointed to unstable lineups due to injuries. James said Detroit‚Äôs speed and physical play made the difference and accepted the result without blaming officials.The Lakers still have elite talent at the top, but repeated blowout losses have raised questions about depth and defense. Detroit, meanwhile, showed again that its young roster can overwhelm teams that fail to keep up.
Article Summary: The los angeles lakers were beaten 128‚Äì106 by the detroit pistons on december 30, 2025. The result dropped the lakers to 20-11 and extended a rough stretch in which they have lost four of their last five games. The same issues showed up again: poor defense, careless turnovers, and little help beyond the top players.

Article Title: Fans call it an ‚ÄúA+ wife move‚Äù as Ayesha Curry‚Äôs gesture toward Golden State Warriors star Stephen Curry explodes online
Article Text:
Ayesha Curry and Stephen Curry. Image via: Getty Images

NBA fans praise Ayesha Curry‚Äôs adorable gesture towards Stephen Curry





Stephen Curry‚Äôs wife, Ayesha Curry , made an explosive statement on her marital life that diverted heads. The Golden State Warriors‚Äô fans did not spare the International Smoke owner, as she was even subjected to backlash by the NBA star‚Äôs fans due to her comments on her marriage. However, both Stephen Curry and his wife, Ayesha, have never spoken about the ongoing rumors around their paradise.Amidst all this, Ayesha Curry‚Äôs recent gesture towards her husband, Stephen Curry, has won the hearts of his million fans on the internet. The Sweet July Skin owner was spotted wearing Stephen Curry‚Äôs Davidson jersey during his recent visit to the college. This simple and heartwarming gesture of Ayesha Curry has diverted the attention of NBA fans on social media.Stephen Curry‚Äôs rise to fame began during his time at Davidson College back in 2008. The two-time NBA MVP went on to become one of the most prominent scorers in school history while leading the Wildcats during the 2008 NCAA Tournament. Recently, the Warriors‚Äô star returned to his school along with his entrepreneur wife, Ayesha Curry.The popular three-point star was given a tribute by the Davidson school during his recent visit to his alma mater. However, instead of the NBA star, his wife, Ayesha, diverted heads with her heartwarming gesture towards him. She was spotted wearing Stephen Curry‚Äôs Davidson jersey during the felicitation program. NBA fans were blown over by this simple gesture of Ayesha and could not stop from commenting about it. A Stephen Curry fan mentioned,‚ÄúA+ wife move.‚ÄùWhile others praised Ayesha Curry for her loving gesture towards her NBA man.‚ÄúThat kind of support never goes out of style love seeing pride and loyalty come full circle like that,‚Äù a fan mentioned‚ÄúShe is definitely stunning üî•üî•,‚Äù said one fan.‚ÄúThat‚Äôs awesome! Ayesha is always supporting Steph‚Äôs roots in the best ways,‚Äù another fan wrote.Social media is buzzing with lovely comments from Stephen Curry‚Äôs fans on Ayesha‚Äôs sweet gesture towards her man. The mother of four clearly proved that the buzz around her marriage holds no weight and everything is great in the Curry‚Äôs paradise. The couple has been married for over a decade and share four adorable kids together. With Stephen Curry in the 17th year of his NBA career, he is a complete man, as when he is not busy representing the Golden State Warriors, he loves spending time with his beloved wife and kids.Also Read: Ayesha Curry sends sweet 4-word reaction to Stephen Curry‚Äôs once-in-a-lifetime moon-shot billboard
Article Summary: Ayesha curry was spotted wearing stephen curry‚Äôs davidson jersey during his recent visit to his alma mater. Nba fans were blown over by this simple gesture of ayesha and could not stop from commenting about it. The couple has been married for over a decade and share four adorable kids together.
